title: Datagol Bridge Input
description: Actor to bridge LinkedIn job scrapes with Datagol.

timeout.title: Actor Timeout (seconds)
timeout.description: Maximum run time for the entire actor in seconds.

datagolApiBaseUrl.title: Datagol API Base URL
datagolApiBaseUrl.description: Base URL for the Datagol API.

datagolApiWorkspaceId.title: Datagol Workspace ID
datagolApiWorkspaceId.description: Workspace ID in Datagol (or set DATAGOL_WORKSPACE_ID env var).

datagolReadToken.title: Datagol Read Token
datagolReadToken.description: Bearer token for reading from Datagol (or set DATAGOL_READ_TOKEN env var).

datagolWriteToken.title: Datagol Write Token
datagolWriteToken.description: Auth token for writing to Datagol (or set DATAGOL_WRITE_TOKEN env var).

jobTitlesTableId.title: Job Titles Table ID
jobTitlesTableId.description: Datagol table ID for job titles.

excludedCompaniesTableId.title: Excluded Companies Table ID
excludedCompaniesTableId.description: Datagol table ID for the excluded companies list.

jobPostingsTableId.title: Job Postings Table ID
jobPostingsTableId.description: Datagol table ID for saving job postings.

totalJobsToFetch.title: Total Jobs to Fetch
totalJobsToFetch.description: Total number of jobs to fetch across all searches.

scraperTimeoutSecs.title: Scraper Timeout (seconds)
scraperTimeoutSecs.description: Timeout for each individual LinkedIn scraper run.

maxConcurrentScrapers.title: Max Concurrent Scrapers
maxConcurrentScrapers.description: Maximum number of scrapers to run in parallel.

jobTitles.title: Job Titles to Search
jobTitles.description: List of job titles to search for. Overrides API fetch.

locations.title: Locations to Search
locations.description: List of locations to search in. Overrides API fetch.

excludedCompanies.title: Companies to Exclude
excludedCompanies.description: List of companies to exclude. Overrides API fetch.

postedInLastHours.title: Posted in Last (Hours)
postedInLastHours.description: Only include jobs posted in the last X hours.
